## Desafio

```{r}
library(readr)
```

```{r}
inicio <- Sys.time()

flights <- read.csv(unz('../dados/flights.csv.zip', 'flights.csv'))

fim <- Sys.time()

fim - inicio
```
 
```{r}
inicio <- Sys.time()

flights1 <- read_csv('../dados/flights.csv.zip', 'flights.csv')

fim <- Sys.time()

fim - inicio
```

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import time

ini = time.time()

flights3 = pd.read_csv("../dados/flights.csv.zip",compression="zip",header=0,sep=",", low_memory=False)

fim = time.time()

fim - ini
```
